heading_semantic=”h3″ text_size=”h3″ subheading=”a new service to identify unauthorized user streams of premium content registered by rights holders. The service addresses industry needs to protect live sports, live-broadcasted music and other premium content. AMLive operates on both live streams and video-on-demand.”]Audible Magic Launches AMLive™ to Protect Against Rebroadcasting Premium Content by Users of Live Streaming Platforms[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_horizontal=”left” gutter_size=”1″ back_color=”color-667011″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ radius=”std” shadow=”std” width=”1/6″][vc_custom_heading text_font=”font-165259″ text_color=”color-xsdn”]April[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h3″ text_font=”font-188013″ text_size=”h3″ text_color=”color-xsdn”]2017[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row]
